Lewis is still in the adjust the heat admitted that playin

Beijing time on October 18 morning, Miami media published an article, reported the rashard lewis is still trying to think of a way to adapt to and blend in Miami, lewis said in an interview, oneself need to change before the shooting, passing the second habit, only in this way can we better in Miami.nike air max womens Below is part of the paper:Since rashard lewis in July this year to veteran minimum salary and Miami after signing, he still hasn't found in Miami feeling. "I now goal is to continue to training every day in training, hope oneself can improve not appear degenerative signs." Lewis in today accept media interviews that said, "I feel to come here, all in an effort to keep their own statenike air max 90, I feel once I miss a day of training, I afraid I will fell behind. We now distance new season opening only two weeks' time, so I have to take the time to training and for the training of gradually find the feeling of a team."The 33-year-old lewis in the offseason this year had undergone knee surgery, he had previously missed the previous two seasons of most of the game
nike air max 90 mens. Lewis now state also had not fully recovered. Lewis, and this is ray Allen and arrived in Miami to participate in training camp, Miami fans to the two pitchers on the arrival of the high expectations. But, after three preseason games after the game,
nike air max 90 womens lewis obviously haven't found for Miami play game feeling."Rashard can play very good." Miami coach spor Stella said, "after all he missed the previous two seasons, so he will find state and feeling is need some time, we will keep on this issue patience." Spor Stella had said these words do not ban people think of last season Eddie - the Treasury situation,
cheap nike air max 90 garage there has been no way to Miami for competition, and handsome, have been foreign is such a statement. Finally, there is no garage for Miami battle circumstances also get a championship ring, lewis is not to repeat mistakes of the garage.

In addition, hoodwinks the cow is still in the museum made a fan paradise. A lot of fans in the big screen and polaroid-type stop before were big show happiness, some fans from the sidelines waiting for NBA face coloured drawing or pattern, nike air max 2011 menand fans immersed in a pitched battle the NBA's interactive game a long time unwilling to leave... As the NBA China's official market cooperation partners, hoodwinks the cow game in micro bo in "the fans happy season" as the theme opened two exclusive rob ticket channel, for the majority of fans provides close feeling NBA charm precious opportunity.

Beijing station activities involved in number four days to reach 20000, some fans come all the way from hebei, shaanxi provinces to watch the game.

Many teams pre-season nap green unlined upper garment army

With the league one of history's most dream team all the way the lakers losing streak, the heat, and thunder and tyrannical cannot avoid loss. In Europe's two games are played very failure, defeat yesterday to 76 people, rivers simply in the second half substitute for all to take, wheel convey to 15 people. nike air max cheapIn this summer, green army in order to fill the position of the ray Allen, signed John terry and courtney lee two shooting guard, the squad will be changed. But rivers still says it needs further investigation team, especially inside. New signing wade is expected to become the team's starting center, but jerry buss condition is also good, nike air max 2012rookie gaza ling more let him see the substitute of hope.And the celtics are similar and thunder and the SAN Antonio spurs, two squad change is not large, but in the face of the other team strength gradually to ascend, they must also internal tapping latent potentialities. The spurs in pre-season rotary as many as 18 people, GDP trio although all appearnike air max 2012 mens, but never more than 20 minutes, more time to substitute.The lakers, heat and the clippers is as far as possible, let them take charge of star of rest, to restore the old injury, catch up with the real season.nike air max 2012 womens The lakers playing squad is still unable to see Howard figure, even the coach mike brown also some embarrassed to say: "I really don't know when he can return." Kobe Bryant have holidays by turns a field, 38 years old Nash also the rest, zijin corps in pre-season is don't want to hurt their any one superstar.

Now they also did not give specific (recovery) schedule.""According to requirements, he is currently training will also to run by warm-up. Although don't have to give priority to nike air max 2012 womenswith 100% of the speed to run, but appropriate activities or necessary, and see his present recovery, I feel very surprised."Jordan - hill is in the pre-season game against golden state, was diagnosed with a back of intervertebral disc herniation.
cheap nike air max 2012 From the rockets last season for the lakers turn after he was regarded as the team inside the most reliable bench. This summer, the lakers and hill signed a two year, $7.1 million contract.

NBA rockets 109-102 the grizzlies LinShuHao state recovery

Star to a great extent determine the team performance is good or bad, in the gold content general NBA have obvious reflect. Yesterday, the rockets is at home with LinShuHao get 7 points,
nike air max shoes 5 rebounds, 12 assists performance, with a 109-102 the grizzlies, stopped straight flagging.This, the state of recovery LinShuHao saved the losing streak in the mire of the rockets. The game LinShuHao shooting is not outstanding, 9 throw in 3 to 7 points is the performance of the general, but it is by his 12 assists, and activate the rockets team offensive.
nike air max 2011In LinShuHao lead bottom, the rockets changes the normal, from the first quarter will hold the lead, and in the third quarter and small time more than half a two-digit advantage. Although grizzlies run at the end of a wave of big 6-0 triumph score high tide, but still can't stop the rockets win.Having Martin, patterson, delfino, Douglas and parsons five players in double,
nike air max 2011 mensthese outside threats player's outstanding performance, let the rockets on the offensive end comprehensive flowering. 50% shooting from the field and 40.9% from 3-point, let the rockets in the face of the same five players in double grizzlies without falling when wind."Today we have put into the ball. This is not only I a person's credit, but everybody together diligently the results.
nike air max 2011 womens" LinShuHao game appear very modest, "in forcing opponents expanding defence after, I can easy selection will ball in inside or outside, it must want to thank you all outstanding feel."Teammates have won LinShuHao as the biggest hero. Parsons evaluation way: "his organization is very good, the vision is, for all of us to create a lot of scoring opportunities.

To YuLinShu hao shooting data, parsons think: "he's with strong deduoshaofen it doesn't matter, he to show they can use what kind of method on the offensive end of the leading this team, how to help the team to win. Tonight, he way to play the game to help us win over rivals."

Delfino: rocket gradually establish a confident young help b

Beijing time on October 19 morning, according to American media, the rockets players delfino today accept media interviews, talk about the rockets in training camp and preseason performance of attack.When talking about the rockets play has made progress, delfino think,nike air max through the pre-season and monopoly of the contest, the rockets are gradually find confidence. "Yes, we have been talking about this, in the front of the pre-season games in the middle, we met a few teams have playoff team strength. nike air max cheapEveryone in the team competition with the process of gradually running in game, are also searching for your confidence." Delfino said, "although in previous games against the spurs in our team was disrupted lead, but we soon through the training before corrected committed some mistakes. In the game against the grizzlies in the middle, our team will play very hard, play obviously than the previous games more organized,nike air max 2011 more discipline. These are all proof of progress."When it comes to concrete against the grizzlies this game the rockets performance, delfino pointed out: "we work hard to try to be sure good shoot, and strive to do to keep shooting,nike air max 2011 men I feel that we do, it is no longer like the previous game there shoot is quite hasty. In the third quarter after the match started, we have threw some gambling type shot, because in the second half after the match started, we started a bit slow, a little be opponent repression, but we work well done. I think, from the overall point of view, now the team played well, nike air max 2011 womenall of us during the game pass well done, every play the players made a contribution in the defensive end, especially we played very good."

Beijing time on October 19 morning, according to American media, the rockets play in the first five pre-season games after the game, and then they will enter into nearly a week of continuous training and adjust time,nike air max but marcus - morris but because the injured thierry to dedicate themselves to the next training in. The rockets trainer Keith Jones sports, said morris sprain ankle better, but now is not comprehensive training.Keith Jones said, nike air max cheapmarcus - the rockets in morris on Saturday before training should have no way to participate in the team for training, but in the rockets next week to play the next pre-season, morris should be able to return. "In morris appearance, he really did good,
nike air max 2012 he in September training effect is very good, and made some progress." The rockets coach McHale said, "he returned to the team in September when training very hard, the state keep fairly well. Morris recently the injury let me feel very sad, but I think he will be able to get a chance. A lot of players in our team construction process are all have a chance,nike air max 2012 mens I hope he can well behind, and then play game, because he played really well."McHale said, behind Maurice upon his return also need a gradually due to injury recovery process. "I never deliberately to limit which a player, but for example a player missed the whole camp training, or maybe there is injury and anxious to return, in his back, nike air max 2012 womens
he may not be in one hundred percent of the state. McHale said, "morris return back after the situation should also is such, but he don't have too many irons in the fire, we want to bring him back to health again after a good play, the opportunity have. We don't want to see our players in training team behind three weeks time, or his state only 85% was anxious to play game.

The wizards executive woll six candidate item facial butt

Beijing time on October 20, 2012, according to American media, wizards carried out including the team core John - woll, six rookie in the 2013-14 season's contract option, will they stay in the team. The six rookie including 4 a level 2010 and 2 2011 level.Four 2010 rookie theo led to, nike air max womenshe is this year of the no. 1 pick, and first 17, Kevin - sierra Finn, the first round of the 23 trevor booker, and the first round number 27 of Jordan crawford. Two level 2011 rookie were first 6 show Jane - dimensional plug the first round and no. 18 rookie Chris singer's meal.The 2013-14 season is four level 2010 rookie of the fourth year, 2 level 2011 rookie of the third year.nike air max 90"In the past several seasons, we will these talent outstanding young people brought to the team, and development have become the core of the team line-up, we are very happy in their later period of time also to the wizards effect." The team general manager glen feld said, "these people add those who experienced veterans, give us a very solid foundation,
nike air max 90 mens we can compete with other teams, in the future on the road will also continue to successful go on."In accordance with the provisions of the alliance, the local time is on October 31st, rookie contract option execution date, now distance this time left about 12 days or so, the wizards have made the decision to advance.nike air max 90 womensIn 2005 to labor clause revised later, first rookie standard contract from the original 3 + 1 into 2 + 1 + 1, which means it is in the first three years of security, the last years is the team option, and now has become the first two years of security, two years after each have a team option. The so-called the team option, is the team have the right to extend or terminate the contract. Now the wizards execution is walter your four people behind of the 1, dimensional plug interest etc. 2 people in front that 1.Are rebuilding of wizards is veteran and new combination of team,
cheap nike air max 90theo is their core. 2011-12 season woll 66 regular-season games all starting, averaging 16.3 points and 4.5 rebounds and 8.0 assists, the top is gradually become mature. College have facial button James Jordan crawford is averaging 14.7 points and 3.0 assists, and assists in the world after the second team, scoring if do not calculate be traded go Nick Yang, is also the team the second.

Si handsome: James can compete with the best defensive play

Beijing time on October 20, morning, from the Miami guard the sun newspaper news say, lebron James came into the league for 9 years, he has won numerous honors, including best rookie, the MVP of the season award, the all-star game MVP and finals MVP, the season first team, the season's first defensive rotations... It must be admitted that,
nike air maxJames very comprehensive, but there is one award chim emperor has never sold one, that's defensive player of the year.Over the past four years, and only 2 players won the defensive player of the year, and it is center, are "warcraft" Dwight - Howard, and last season's tyson chandler. James in the award in the second highest ranking selection, the last season with 112 points in the fourth row.nike air max cheap The local time Friday when accepting a reporter to interview, Miami coach spor Stella said he hoped the James can receive this year defensive player of the year. "If lebron (James) to compete defensive player of the year, in my opinion this is a good thing," handsome, said, "I think last season he in the defensive end effect and influence not loss to the alliance any one person.
nike air max 95"In fact from China after returned to Miami, Miami in many players still in upside down time. As James, local time Thursday in Miami victory over Detroit preseason, James performance is very general. "Still had not fully recovered," James said. "but this is only a matter of time, we need a process." On the other hand, Miami there are still some injury problems,
nike air max 95 mens such as check moss, Joel - Anthony and HaSiLeM etc because of injury did not participate in the with the pistons in pre-season, and according to reveal, handsome, HaSiLeM is expected to wait for the player to local time on Saturday Miami and the spurs on the pre-season tour return.Wade in and pistons on the pre-season tour performance good, 23 minutes against attack down 21 points and five assists. This wade said: "I now is still in the adjust my rhythm,
nike air max 95 womens
I found myself there are still some aspects need to strengthen, but I with his present overall performance will be satisfied." The handsome, said: "I'm very happy wade the present situation, he returned to the old speed and agility. Wade had knee surgery this summer, before Miami's dwyane wade is likely only in this year's pre-season dozen 1 game; Now China is the 2 games, wade has three consecutive games debut, and performance becomes more and more outstanding, the Miami absolutely is a good news.

Rider two will contract option Owen Thompson left-behind

Beijing time on October 20, early morning, Cleveland cavaliers general manager Chris - grant in the local time Friday team's facility in formally announced that the cavaliers have carried out the defender Carey - Michael Owen and striker Tristan da cunha Thompson contract for the third year in optionsnike air max.Young Michael Owen and Thompson is known as the cavaliers future, "Carey (Owen) and Tristan (Thompson) as a player and as a man, is the team to build team representatives of thoughts. They focus, diligence, have a talent, we are looking forward to them as a part of the cavaliers,nike air max cheap
in Cleveland, continuous improvement and eventually succeed." The 20-year-old Owen is 2011 NBA first overall pick, and 21 year old Thompson was in 2011 the first round of the sequence 4 rookie.As a rookie of the year, Owen in the 2011-04 season on behalf of the cavaliers played a total of 51 of the regular season and all starting,
nike air max 90 averaging 30.5 minutes for 18.5 points 3.7 rebounds and 5.4 assists 1.1 steals enter an item in an account, field goal percentage is 46.9%. The offseason, Michael Owen in training the right hand fracture, but now has healed. nike air max 90 menSince lebron James left Cleveland and join Miami, Owen became the cavaliers new leader.Thompson regular season on behalf of the cavaliers played a total of 60 games, among them 25 starts, averaging 23.7 minutes for contribution 8.2 points and 6.5 rebounds 1.0 blocked shots, he was named in the second team last season rookie.nike air max 90 women The cavaliers believe that the upcoming 12-13 season, Mr Thompson will be playing more points, and his rebounds number is likely to reach double digits. It is not difficult to see that the cavaliers to Michael Owen and Thompson has high expectations.

But doctors say two personal status is good.Local time Saturday garage accepted fokker the doctor's examination, the result is don't need to worry too much about. "Now let him play is not have what meaning, let him play no harvest, I wouldn't worry too much, but we for this

Allen's defected green army reason unearned respect nature

Beijing time on October 22, ray Allen gave up the celtics on higher contract, choose at lower wages and in the Miami lineup plays the same role, about Allen defected green unlined upper garment of the cause of the army opinions vary, of which the most way of god and the contradiction between the rajon rondo.
nike air max womensBut in accept the Miami herald "interview, Allen revealed himself to leave the celtics reason, because in Boston he didn't get the team to a striker when the some respect.
If Allen have no choice to join the heat of words, so his shirt most likely in after they retired hanging in over the arena, and "big bird" Byrd, Russell and library west the legend of the shirt hanging together together.
nike air max 90Allen help green unlined upper garment army in 22 years won the first championship, but also it is in wear green shirt, he broke the NBA history's 3-point streak. However Allen eventually chose to give up these should have some glory, is also a substitute role,
nike air max 90 mens but this name old striker finally chose to join green army base salary of old rivals the heat, and have no choice to stay in Boston.
It is also for Allen to Celtic not loyalty, he was Boston fans' abuse, because in the United States, loyalty is the pronoun of Boston, as money is refers to New York, Chicago is political symbol, rocky mountain represents the Denver,
nike air max 90 womensand Hollywood is Los Angeles general portraiture. Allen natural understand green unlined upper garment armed soldiers loyal trust, but he chose to leave - even if he can there and get higher contract, get few players can enjoy jersey retirement honor.
However, when the celtics requirements Allen to Bradley substitute, to help the team rebuilding, Allan refused the team's this location. He finally chose to Miami, although also is playing the role of the bench, but in Miami he won the higher respect. "In Boston, they told me to let me make the bench, to reduce the appearance of time.
cheap nike air max 90 I said:" in the past two years in the field you see me as a trap (refers to is not score point) to use, then you and how to use me? '" Allen said, "is it in all the tactics of you all movement the ball, and my task is to pass the ball to other place, never for I create opportunities to score, and I are in the game most of the time a person stood alone in the corner of."

Charles barkley see failure bynum prospect small sharks s

Pre-season has come to an end, the new season is imminent, but Andrew bynum a move into the 76 ers, still did not give his first show in Philadelphia.nike air max For "small shark" future, Charles barkley said do not look good.Bynum still beset by a knee injury, as for injury what, who can't also a decision. "Bynum came to 76 people, let me very happy," Charles barkley said, "76 people are want him as never before has done things,
nike air max cheapthis is a difficult challenge. This takes bynum in each night become the team's core character. He must stay healthy, then the game play dominant, attract lane-packing, for the perimeter players create vacancy opportunity, but as you know, he is with him."Bynum in the lakers got two championship rings, 24 years old he was last season best team the second team, or all star western starting center
nike air max 90, averaging 18.7 points and 11.8 rebounds 1.93 shots. But in Charles barkley view, the "small shark" excellent play, depends entirely on kobe Bryant and pau gasol, and even pau gasol in the game tough degree, also more than Andrew bynum."Joe Johnson in the sun is a great player, but in the eagle he hard to keep the same level, small amare stoudemire can also feel the same situation in New York
nike air max 90 men, left a players, they will be different." Charles barkley said.Before this, bynum has never become a team on the pitch and the leader, he is in kobe Bryant and pau gasol on the wings of a dove in the battle. This let bynum although 24 years old, but the mind is still not mature, often have some childish behavior, nike air max 90 womensuch as the playoffs last season to the mavericks he and the extremely dangerous foul, and unaccountable three points selection. In April this year, the lakers general manager mitch kupchak admitted, bynum is a "sometimes is very good, sometimes very bad" players, the problem is - you do not know which one day he is good or bad.

The rockets rookie praise book hao to be modest lamb effor

Beijing time on October 23, morning, the United States media published an article in the rockets rookie player jeremie lamb write new diary, lamb in the diary of the talked about in Houston's life and the rockets some of the relevant situation. The following is the lamb latest diary part of translationnike air max womens:This is the first time I've been really one personal life, it was really cool! For me, have their own space is a good thing. So far, I am very like Houston, this is a makes me feel excited city. In 2011 I was with the Connecticut school team here too NCAA national championship, so I to the city has a very good memory. I to the present travel will use satellite locatornike air max 90, but in general I have been able to find the place where I want to go to.My parents and sister also come along with me together from Atlanta moved to Houston to live, but they are not and I live in the same street, they live from me about 5 minutes by car. My sister this year, 17 years old, so she was in Houston for a new middle school to continue to study,
nike air max 90 mens she came to Houston for life and study is also felt very excited. Let my family live from me so nearly place is a wonderful thing. In the end of the training, when I feel tired, I'll call my mother, let them for me a delicious meal. I myself will cook rice, I like his breakfast do some Fried eggs, Fried steak and so on. I usually at half past seven every morning or get up at 8 o 'clock,
nike air max 90 womens and then make breakfast, eat breakfast at half past eight after go out to go to the team's training. However, in addition to breakfast, but other food I wouldn't do. During the period of university, I have your own hamburger, behind I'll try.We talk about the rockets! Our team is a great team, we players get along very well, I really like the rockets now coaching staff.
cheap nike air max 90
We had a few field difficult pre-season games, but we have been working to training, to allow the team to become more outstanding. As for my personal performance of in the preseason, I feel is ok. There are some things that I can do better, but this is a learning process. I now are trying to training their control of the ball, as well as the ball of his ability, I still trying to improve their rebound congested ability.

Arenas close to joining CBA zero, agent or with yi teammate

And in marbury and t-mac later, and there will be former NBA all-star companion CBA league, this will further increase the CBA league people, help CBA develop sports market.Arenas a former all-star player, he was in the league for 11 years,cheap nike air max 1 arenas career altogether has played in 552 regular-season games, averaging 35.1 minutes against contribute 20.7 points and 5.3 assists 3.9 rebounds 1.6 steals. - 06 season is arenas, the most outstanding performance of 1 year, he was on behalf of the wizards has played in 80 regular-season games, and averaged 29.3 points and 6.0 assists 3.5 rebounds 2.0 steals. In the summer of 2008
nike air max 2010, arenas and wizards renewed a six-year contract worth $111 million. But after that, because of injury, arenas frequent absence game; And in the end of 2009, arenas in the door "the event. 10 to 11 in the middle of the season, the Washington wizards will arenas traded to the Orlando magic.Last season was finished, just to be traded to the Orlando magic in the near arenas team he had layoffs,
nike air max 2009although at that time arenas contract with 3 year, $63 million and be cut soon, arenas and joined the Memphis grizzlies, however, this is just a temporary employment. After the end of last season, arenas is out of work. In grizzly bear period, arenas played in only 16 games, averaging only played 12 minutes, averaging is only poor 4.4 points 1 assists,
nike air griffey max 1 is in the lowest career.As early as the end of September has been sources said arenas the former NBA all-star player is seriously considering China played the new season. This offseason, arenas most of the time and its trust Joe o bond training with gaza, occasionally appear in the lakers or the clippers play the game in the gym, and state looks good.

The rockets training camp packed low efficiency MaiShuai

According to "Houston chronicle" news, in yesterday, McHale is dissatisfied with the players training attitude, with the rockets rotation of the basic sure, layoffs have also been put on the agenda, and those who take a non-guaranteed contract players are likely to be cut. Because the rockets training camp "crowded" (a total of 17 players), training efficiency is low, today carried on marathon training after thatnike air max 2009, MaiShuai still were not satisfied effect, think the players thought is not centralized, training intensity is not enough.MaiShuai says, it will take some time reiterated some things, and give young people the chance to as much as possible. He thinks that, when lean squad after, this situation will change, on the other hand, it is preparing for the future, those players can be decentralized to the membership of league NBDL team viper team continues to exercise.nike air max 2009 men He said: "when we make layoffs later, things will get better. Some players and viper team signup. Our training number decreases after, training efficiency will be improved, strength also will follow up. Now, we have to cost a lot of time to repeat."MaiShuai revealed, the rockets will be the lower 2 to 3 players in the league NBDL play, continue to exercise and investigation.
